inn1.comm: length and in at off stump, allows it to come on and drops it into the off side with soft hands from deep in the crease
length ball floated up at off stump. Soft hands as he defends, but he can't steal a run
full on off stump, driven watchfully to mid-off's left
shot. It's a throwdown really. 119kph overpitched ball outside off, gets his stride at it and caresses it between cover and extra
length outside off, opens the face and chops it down to third man
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
good length ball with some late swing away in the corridor. Blocked on the front foot
124kph, length ball into the pads, can't get bat on the flick. Picks up a leg-bye pitchside
130kph, length ball just outside off, punched firmly on the up to mid-off
short of a length outside off, opens the face and guides it to third man
short and wide outside off, chops it to third man's right on the up
length ball into the pads, flicked to fine leg's left
114kph, Sourav Ganguly pace. And Shikhar Dhawan slaps it away through cover like it has just called him Shekhar. Short and wide outside off, spanked on the up
length on leg stump, clipped to midwicket on the up
length on leg stump, tapped back towards the bowler from the crease
length on leg stump, clipped on the up towards midwicket
length ball on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, whipped straight to midwicket from the crease
length ball at off stump, defended from the crease, minimal feet
length ball in at off stump, blocked on the front foot
short ball outside off, sliced on the up. On the bounce to gully
length on off stump, tapped to mid-off on the up
walks down at it and drags this to the square leg boundary. Short of a length ball outside off, heaves at it and gets it off the inside half
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
120kph, length on the pads, and he waits a long time before tapping this wide of mid-on on the rise
length on off stump, defended to point on the front foot
length on off stump, nicely forward to defend into the point region
length outside off, a check-drive to mid-off on the up. Once more, Afzal's non-pace messing with Dhawan's flow
lofts it over mid-on. Once again, not proper connection. Length on middle stump and he has to put in some effort to clear mid-on with this drive. It's enough during the Powerplay
and again, looks to go over mid-on and ends up dragging it. Slow, slow pitch. Length ball on middle and he lofts it wider this time, off the inside half
length ball just outside off, mistimed drive on the up into the off side
length outside off, slapped on the up to extra cover
slower ball at a length on off stump. Gets forward early and is forced to adjust and tap towards point
length outside off, defended to cover point off the front foot
full ball wide outside off, laboured drive, more forearm than anything, but he gets it past cover point
whack. Short outside off, he's across to get behind the line and club this to the midwicket boundary
length on middle stump, defended down the pitch on the front foot
short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
short ball doesn't come on as he gets in position for the pull. He's made to swivel as a result as he gets this out to deep square
full on off stump, driven towards mid-off off the inside half
length outside off, punched to cover point on the up
length on off stump, defended to point off the front foot
length and in at off stump. Opens the face as he taps this into the covers
length and in at middle stump, flicked expertly into the open midwicket region
length on leg stump, clipped to midwicket off the front foot

taken at mid-off. This is nicely engineered by the bowler. Floats it up at off stump, no cover for the slog on the leg side so Rohit wants to take that option. But he has played three cross-batted hits and failed to connect them cleanly today, and the fourth one is the downfall. He's not to the pitch and he gets a leading edge. Simple catch..
length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket off the front foot
short of a length skidder outside off, left alone on the back foot
length ball just outside off, defended into the off side
full on middle stump, flicked to mid-on off the front foot
length ball skidded in at middle stumps. Through the flick shot too early. Gets an inside edge onto pad
length outside off, driven on the up to mid-off's right
yorker on leg stump, nicely dug out to get this wide of mid-on
short of a length outside off, cut to backward point
short and wide outside off, cut to cover on the up
short and wide outside off, pushed through fast. Waits on it and chops it between short third man and point
misfield and four more behind square. Short again, good pace on it too. Waits on it and cuts late to backward point's right. His dive is too slow
arm ball at a length on off stump, opens the face and runs it to short third
beaten. Gets this one to dip and spin away. Length outside off and he's drawn forward before being duped
short of a length at off, tapped to extra cover off the back foot
length ball outside off, and angling into Rayudu's body. He prods forward and fends off the front foot
full, but wider outside off. Minimal footwork from Rayudu, as he taps this with the angled bat towards cover
full and wide, and this time Rayudu steps forward before slashing a cover drive right over the infield! Played with the angled bat, and he plays it squarer instead of in the 'v'
offcutter, wide outside off stump. Rayudu stands tall and carves a back-foot punch through the covers to the fielder in the deep
back of a length on middle, and Dhawan rocks back before swiveling a pull along the ground to the deep midwicket boundary. As easy as ABC
back of a length on middle again, but with the ball angling away. Dhawan punches off the back foot to cover
length ball outside off, and worked off the back foot past the fielder at cover
good length on off, and turning into his pads. Flicked off the back foot to square leg for a single
full on off stump, and Dhawan takes a big stride forward to defend
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to deep extra cover for a walking single
full outside off stump, and driven firmly off the front foot to wide mid off
full on middle, and Dhawan carefully fends this with the angled bat towards the leg side
good length just outside off, and this one skids through after pitching. Fended off the back foot
full on middle, and this is defended off the front foot once again
full just outside off, and blocked off the front foot
good length on middle, and Rayudu uses his wrists to whip this behind square off the back foot. Chase for the fielder at short fine leg
full on off stump, and blocked off the front foot once again. Played to cover on this occasion
wider outside off, and he makes room to cut this behind square. Dribbles away to point for a dot. A tight over from Nadeem to start his spell
full on off, and blocked with soft hands off the front foot. Cover point attacks the ball and ensures it's a dot
flatter on off, and Dhawan rocks back to tap this back to the bowler
good length outside off, and Dhawan muscles a punch off the back foot to mid on
good length just outside off, and turning into Rayudu's body. Fended to mid on, but a misfield allows them to pinch a single
back of a length outside off, and firmly struck off the back foot past the non-striker. Long on intercepts
back of a length outside off, and spinning into Rayudu. He goes onto the back foot and caresses a shot down the ground for a walking single
full on middle stump, and that's been carefully defended off the front foot
good length outside off, and tapped back off the back foot
full on off, and caressed down the ground past short cover. The fielder dives but can't stop the ball from going past him
full on middle and leg. Cramped for space, but manages to defend this back to Nadeem
loopy and lands on off stump. Tapped to point with soft hands, and they take off for a quick single
full just outside off, and driven off the front foot. Comes off the top-half of the bat, but dribbles down to long off anyway
full on off, and spinning in sharply. Knocks this - off the front foot - to long on for one
good length outside off, and he carves a cut-shot between point and backward point! Pierces the gap because of how late he played that shot
full on leg stump, and turned off his pads to square leg. They walk across for one
full just outside off, and driven with the spin to mid on. Off the bat's inside-half on this occasion
good length on middle, and whipped off his pads to deep backward square
good length just outside off, and blocked off the back foot with the angled bat. Time for the first drinks break
full just outside off stump. Defended towards cover
full on middle, and Rayudu opts for the sweep. Mistimed to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
full on middle, and he taps this with the angled bat to midwicket
full on middle and leg. No real turn from Nadeem as Dhawan blocks off the front foot
full on middle stump, and nudges to the leg side off the front foot
back of a length on middle, and punched off the back foot to the fielder at cover
full on off, and turning into his pads. Driven down the ground to long on for one
full but wide outside off. Dhawan takes a step forward, and pushes with soft hands to cover
full just outside off stump. Tapped to the off side
full just outside off stump, and caressed down the ground to long off
full just outside off, and nudged off the front foot to cover. Nice call early for the single
back of a length on middle stump, and he uses his wrists to flick this square off his hips. Trickles down to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
full on off, and punched down the ground. But Nadeem dives to his right and intercepts off his own bowling
full on off, and Rayudu uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball. Tapped to short cover
full on off, and this time he gives the bowler a charge. Smacks a drive through the covers, but there's protection in the deep
back of a length on middle stunmp. Punched off the back foot to long on for a walking single
full on off, but Rayudu gives the bowler a charge once again. He bowls this slower through the air, and Rayudu manages to pad this away to the off side
pulled along the ground but there's someone at wide long-on. Flat and short on middle this time
full just outside off, and driven off the front foot past the fielder at cover. Wide long off needs to run across the boundary and Dhawan gets to another ODI fifty!
full on middle stump, and he uses the angled bat to drive towards the leg side. Beats midwicket, and goes to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
good length outside off, and firmly punched off the back foot to cover point
short on middle, and Dhawan pulls this away off the back foot! Hits it very square, and deep midwicket has no chance to cut it off
full on middle, and bunted down the ground, past the bowler's left for a single
short outside off, and Rayudu muscles a pull right over cow corner! Spotted the length early and gave the ball the treatment it deserved.
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket with the turn
length and pushed through at middle. Gets down the pitch and bat-pads it into the leg side
length on the pads, flicked to midwicket on the front foot
lovely! That is handsome. Gets down the track to where Nadeem has been belting it in all spell, and uses the turn to open his body and lift this to the extra cover boundary
length on off stump, pushed down the pitch off the front foot
arm ball coming in at leg stump, punched to long-on
length ball just outside off, sliced through cover point on the up
short and wide outside off, slaps it to sweeper cover's right
nice! Length ball just outside off, plants a confident stride down and launches it over mid-off
length on leg stump, whipped to deep square leg off the back foot
length on leg stump, punched to long-on
length on off stump, tapped to extra cover...who lets it through
length on leg stump, leans in and flicks through square leg off the front foot
length on off stump, punched to long-off with the turn
full on leg stump, flicked to short fine
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on leg stump, flicked past midwicket off the front foot
short ball slanted across off stump and keeps low. He swivels and pulls to deep midwicket
length on off stump, blocked into the covers
length on off stump, tapped on the rise to mid-off
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
length on off stump, defended to extra cover off the back foot
length on off stump, tapped to mid-off's left on the up
length on leg stump, pushed through square leg with the turn
length on off stump, pushed to point off the outside edge
big shout but probably sliding down. Looks to sweep this length ball and is struck in front of leg stump
length on off stump, pushed on the up past the bowler
short of a length, slanted across him from around the wicket. Cramps himself a little with the front foot push, but manages to guide this to backward point's right. Fumble there allows a second
full on off stump, defended on the front foot
short of a length outside off, tapped into the covers off the back foot
gets it to the deep square boundary. Short of a length at the ribs. He's going down the pitch so he has to have fast hands. He does. Carts it on the up
length outside off, punched on the up to sweeper cover
length on off, defended into the covers
length on the pads, stays tall as he clips this to deep backward square
short of a length on middle stump, caresses a pull to deep square's right
length on off stump, punched towards mid-off but extra cover puts in a tumble to stop that
length on off stump, pushed through mid-off on the up
length on off stump, pushed into the covers with soft hands
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
short of a length on middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
bouncer at the chest, pulled uppishly towards deep square
length on off stump, tapped to extra cover on the up
short of a length outside off. Gets down the track to try and pull it, but he mistimes it. Trickles back down the pitch

thick edge to bring up his fifty. Not been easy to play boundary strokes on this pitch and that shot says the story. Short of a length and cramping him outside off. He looks to play the square drive, gets a big edge down to third man. It's been a solid knock..
length on off stump, opens the face as he drives towards extra cover...who fumbles and gives them a single at mid-off
length on leg stump, defended on the front foot
short of a length skidder into the corridor. Waits and chops to backward point
short and wide outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
tossed up at off stump, steps out and drives to long-off
clears midwicket. That's a good shot. His go-to when attacking spinners. Lobbed up slow and at a length outside off. Uses his reach - not a big one - to get under that and scythe it over the boundary
short of a length on off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
length on leg stump, clipped to midwicket off the toe-end
short and wide outside off, under-edges the cut to backward point

caught-behind and that's a good grab from McKechnie. It's a bouncer, high above the batsman's front shoulder. He's looking to guide that to third man with an upper cut and has got a glove on that. The keeper has taken it with a reverse cup - while being up to the stumps. Good take. Some checking on the front foot of the bowler and he has just managed to keep it legal.
length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
bouncer doesn't go a lot higher than hip-height. He swivels and pulls to fine leg
short and wide outside off, left alone
length outside off, blocked solidly on the front foot
back of a length on middle, and blocked off the back foot
full on leg stump, and Dhawan uses his feet to flick this square past midwicket to the man in the deep
good length just outside off, and punched through the covers
length ball on off, and too close for the cut. Plays the shot straight to point
good length on leg stump and punched down the ground to long on. A walking single
full on middle, and angling into his pads. DK misses the front-foot defense as the ball hits his pad. Would've definitely gone down leg. Replays show an inside-edge onto his pads
short! And the ball goes just over Dhawan's head. Ducks under the bal's line. Dhawan doesn't have a helmet on
short outside leg stump, and this time Dhawan swivels to pull! Played fine behind square, and fine leg just can't cut it off
good length on middle, and angling across his body. Dhawan tries to cut square, but toe-ends the shot to cover point
good length on middle, and tucked off his pads to deep midwicket for one
back of a length on off, and fended off the back foot to cover
beautifully struck! Full just outside off, and he leans into an exquisite cover drive to cap the over off on a high
full outside off, and DK opens his bat's face to dab this shot to short third man
full on middle, and fended off the front foot
full on off stump, and he comes forward to defend off the front foot
full on middle, and driven down the ground to long off for one
full on leg stump, and he clips this off the back foot to move into the 90s
good length on off stump, and angling into Dhawan from around the wicket. Punched to mid on
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to fend off the back foot
slower ball, but full outside off stump. Driven to the off side
short on middle, and Dhawan pulls this with ease! Top-edges it slightly, but places it well near the fine-leg boundary. Still batting without a helmet
full just outside off, and he caresses a square drive to the sweeper on the off side
full just outside off, and he crunches a cover drive straight to the fielder. He's overstepped though. Free hit
good length on middle, and DK mis-hits a flat-batted shot right over the bowler's head
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover point
full on off stump as DK shuffles around his stumps. Eventually taps this towards the off side
short on middle, and he backs away to misfield a pull to midwicket
good length on off, and he punches this firmly down the ground to the long on
full outside off stump, and he caresses a straight drive past the non-striker to long off once again
full on middle stump, and tapped down the ground to long on
full on middle, and he flicks this off his toes to move on to 98. Sweeper in the deep intercepts
full on off, and turning inwards. DK looks to defend, and inside-edges the shot towards the leg side
full on off, and he whips this through the midwicket region for another single. Good use of the wrists there
full and wide outside off, and that's been crunched through the covers! Nice followthrough of the bat there. An excellent forward-stride as well
full outside off, but DK uses the bottom-hand to whip a drive to long on
wide outside off, and comfortably cut to deep point for a walking single. His 14th ODI hundred in 105 innings!
full on off, and tapped down the ground to long on. Good rotation of the strike
good length on leg stump, and he nudges this off his pads to the leg side for one

big appeal for lbw! But the ball dribbles away to the third-man boundary for four instead. Full on middle, but Dhawan came forward for the drive, and even got bat on it. Not sure what the spinner was thinking there
good length just outside off. Dhawan pushes this to Rath at cover, who misfields. Rare
full on off stump. Defended with soft hands towards point
full on middle, and DK uses his feet to clip this off his toes to deep midwicket. Cals early for the second run
full outside off, and he goes for an expansive sweep. Tries to fetch it from outside the stumps and misses
full just outside off, but Dhawan slog sweeps straight into the stands! Premeditated perhaps, but he'll take those runs
full on leg stump, and driven inside-out to cover. Rath stops the ball well, but they pinch a single anyway
good length on off, and spinning inwards. DK tries to paddle this fine, but it hits his thigh guard instead
full, but wider outside off, and driven down the ground to long off

Dhawan prepares for the reverse sweep even before the bowler has delivered the ball, and he bowls flat and full on middle. Dhawan misses the shot, and the ball hits his pad. Huge appeal for lbw, but not given. Hong Kong are reviewing. Impact's outside off though, so it'll remain not out.
drags this full on leg stump, and Dhawan dances down the ground to convert it into a full toss. Clips it off his pads, and plays it square enough to beat wide long on
full outside off,  and Dhawan drags a sweep from outside the stumps to hand the strike back over to DK
full on middle, and he turns it off his legs to the fielder at midwicket
length ball on off, and Dhawan reverse paddles to short third man
full on off, and DK comes down the ground to caress a drive to long off
good length on off, and he paddles a pull with soft hands to the leg side. Almost goes straight into square leg's hands
sharp spin! Lands on off, and comes into his pads. Tries to sweep, but misses
full on his pads, and that's been fiercely swept off his toes to the backward-square boundary!
full on off, and pushed towards the leg side for one
full on middle stump, and he slogs this across the line! Lands into the stands. Got into position early and he kept his eyes on the ball through the shot
full on off, and he muscles this over the non-striker's head to long on
full on middle, and swept hard to the fielder in the deep on the leg side
length ball pushed across off stump, leans in and pushes into the point region with soft hands
dropped. Full toss on off stump, steps out and drills it back to the bowler. Reverse cup to his left but that has burst through
short and wide outside off, punched to sweeper cover

taken at point. Top edge as he slashes across the line. Gentle lob for the fielder there. Length outside off from Kinchit, attempt to go midwicket by Dhawan. Wasn't behind that one. Good ODI innings. The crowd is already chanting for Dhoni...
short and wide outside off, chopped to deep backward point
length ball pushed across off stump, late push on the front foot to point
length outside off, inside edge onto pad as he gets forward to block
length outside off, gets right forward and tickles it into the leg side
length ball pushed through fast at middle stump. Pushed hurriedly to midwicket's left off the back foot

got him! Thin edge and another good catch from McKechnie. Length ball skids through outside off. Dhoni stays leg side of it and looks to stab late for the one that turns. No such luck. The crowd reverts to original state. Except that one kid with an Indian jersey who is trying to rip his seat out in anger.
tossed up full outside off, driven to long-off
length on middle stump, gets down as it comes on and ramps it past short fine. Crafty stuff from Karthik
length ball pushed wide outside off, left alone
length on leg stump, allows it to come on and nudges to midwicket's right

holes out at deep midwicket! India are crumbling against the slow bowlers in their bid to make the big runs. Not a bad strategy at all from Hong Kong o a slow pitch. And not a bad catch  either out there - Babar Hayat sprints a long way to his right, holds on at waist height and puts in a nice hip-first slide to maintain his shape and hold on. DK was looking to pump that length ball over deep midwicket with a slog sweep
short of a length on off stump, punched to long-off off the back foot
short of a length quicker one outside off, gets on the back foot and hurriedly punches down the pitch. Bowler can't field cleanly despite the dive
short on middle stump, pulled to deep square
length on leg stump, clipped through square leg off the front foot
length on off stump, punched past the bowler from the crease
slower short ball, wide outside off. Left alone
length outside off, punched into the covers off the front foot
short ball outside off, under-edge as he looks to cut through point
length outside off, guided down to third man
full outside off, watchful drive to extra cover
length outside off, looks to flick but has closed the face too early. It rolls back down the pitch off the leading edge
short of a length on middle, goes deep in the crease and pokes it to short fine's left
dropped. Kinchit with a lunge to his left yet again. Can't quite get two hands on it this time. Jadhav down the track to drill one back without getting to the pitch. He can only parry it to long-off
short of a length on middle stump, punched back to the bowler
short of a length on middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
yorker on leg stump, jammed out to midwicket
full on leg stump, chipped down towards long-on
slower bouncer outside off, steps out and is made to adjust. Does it well. Uses his wrists to nudge this between deep square and deep midwicket
slower bouncer attempted again, but this is dug too short. Floats high and wide
yorker at middle stump, shuffles and gets it between fine leg and deep square this time. Expert placement once again
yorker on off stump, backs away and looks to chop one past short third man. But he can't get it past that fielder

what a shot! It takes god-like perfection to get your timing right for a straight six on this pitch, and that's what Jadhav has produced. Difficult to hit big shots in front of the wicket here, but he's down the pitch, met it on the pitch and has nonchalantly chipped this over the sightscreen
length outside off, guides it to backward point with soft hands
length ball skidding across him, gets low and opens the face to guide it past short third man
tossed up outside off, late on the attempted slog. It trickles to midwicket's left
short and wide outisde off, backs away and cuts straight to extra cover. There's that slowness being cumbersome again
full on leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket
short and wide outside off, and once more the cut doesn't go past extra cover
slower short ball going down leg side, can't get bat on the attempted hook
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
short ball on middle stump, guides it to deep square with a pull
beaten with the slower ball. Offcutter dug in back of a length outside off. Grips and climbs over his attempted cut through the off side as he steps out
length outside off, pushed to extra cover from the crease
short ball at the mid-riff, looks to pull and can only manage to chip it towards short fine
beaten. Good bowling. Wide yorker as Jadhav shuffles across. He's cramped as he looks to chop it down to third man
short at middle stump, mistimed pull out to deep midwicket
short ball at the stumps, can't get any power on the pull. Rolls to midwicket
full and wide outside off, reaches out and drills it to long-on along the turf
taken at midwicket. A third wicket for Kinchit. Short, sliding across, slow. Bhuvi looks to pull and gets it off the toe-end. A good lunging catch to the left too
short on middle stump, flicked to midwicket off the back foot
beaten. Full and flat ball outside off, slides past the outside edge as Thakur backs away and looks to launch one over extra cover
full toss on middle stump, shuffles and shovels. Picks up two from between deep square and deep midwicket
slower ball dropped short outside off, shuffles and pulls on the front foot to deep midwicket's left
full ball wide outside off, looks to play the sweep because square leg is in. Sweeps it onto his boot and gets a single pitch side
holes out to long-off. Offcutter at a length outside off, near-impossible to clear the ground when that is bowled. Thakur looks to do that with a slog, he slices it up for Carter who takes it cleanly
full toss outside off, flicks to deep midwicket's left
gets down early for the sweep and the bowler adjusts by floating up a slower ball wide. He can only get it as far as square leg for a single

inn2.comm: edged wide of first slip! That silences the Indian supporters in the crowd right away. Length ball outside off, and tailing further away. Nizakat pokes hard at it, and edges it over the cordon
full outside off, and slightly moving away. Left alone
length ball wide outside off, and this one zips straight through into MSD's gloves
full on off stump, and forces the batsman to get bat on ball. Pushed straight off the front foot
good length outside off, and he runs this fine past the cordon to third man
full on leg, and clipped off his toes to midwicket. Five off the first over
full on off stump, 137kph, defended off the front foot
full just outside off, and driven away from his body to cover
full outside off stump, and driven away from his body. But it takes the outside edge, and trickles down to third man
full on off, and straightening after hitting the deck. Fended off the front foot. 138kph
back of a length on middle, and the leg-side clip takes a leading edge towards point. They scamper across for one
good length on off stump, and blocked away to the leg side
full outside off, and he caresses a drive away from his body past the cover fielder. Rayudu gives it a chase
good length on middle, and he nudges it to the leg side to take off for a quick single
good length on off, and the back-foot defense takes the outside edge to first slip. But drops just short
full just on off, and he takes a step forward to defend
good length on off, and holds it's line as it slightly angles across the bat's body. Tried to defend, but the ball sneaks past his outside edge
back of a length on leg stump, and tapped off his waist to the leg side. Still not off the mark, Rath
full on middle, and angling into the right-hander. Clipped away to midwicket. 138 kph
full just outside off, and driven away from his body. Played the shot a bit too late, and the drive goes to point instead. 137 kph
back of a length on off, and going further away from Nizakat. Tries to slap-shot a cut over the slips, but can't get bat to ball
full outside off, and driven away from his body. This time the timing is sweet, and the shot pierces the infield on the off side
good length outside off, and angling slightly inwards. Tapped towards cover. 137.5kph
width offered outside off, and he crunches this square off the back foot! Races away to the point boundary. 136 kph
back of a length on leg stump, and he tiptoes onto his back foot to defend
full on leg stump, and nudged off his pads to the leg side
full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to drive straight to mid off
full just outside off, and that's been blocked off the back foot. The ball was wildly swinging inwards
full on off, and that's been lifted over mid off! Chase for Kuldeep, and Anshy Rath gets off the mark
good length on off, and angling inwards. Tries to defend, but hits the top of his front leg
full on off, and angling away from the right-hander. Nizakat drives late and mistimes the shot to cover point
full on middle stump, and fended off the front foot
full on off stump once more, and blocked off the front foot
full on middle, and nudged down the ground to mid on. Shardul misfields and that allows them to take the run
good length on leg stump. Slower ball now from Khaleel. Flicked off his pads to square leg with ease
full outside off, and that's been crunched through the off side. Meets the ball with the straight bat, and smacks this through the infield
back of a length just outside off. Blocked off the back foot
good length just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend with soft hands
full outside leg stump, and the slower ball slips out of his hand. Goes down the leg side. 112 kph
punched straight past the bowler! Full on middle stump, and driven off the front foot. Nice bat-lift and then the bat speed does the rest
drops the length. Back of a length on off, and the back-foot defense takes an outside edge to short third man
back of a length on middle, but going down leg. Nizakat tiptoes and meets the ball from near his hip, and flicks it fine past Dhoni's left for a boundary. Run-rate over 5 now
good length just outside off, and Nizakat shuffles across to cover his stumps, and defends off the back foot
good length outside off, and that's been slapped through the off side. But DK at cover point dives to his right to stop the ball from going for a definite boundary
back of a length on middle, and he runs this down fine to third man for a single
Short! Forces the batsman to duck under it. Lands on off stump, and whizzes past his helmet. He had taken his eyes totally off the ball, so Nizakat's lucky he didn't get hurt
good length on off stump, and blocked off the back foot to Thakur
back of a length on off. Nizakat stays on the back foot, and taps this back to the bowler once again
short again, but this time angling down leg. Nizakat swivels to pull, and mistimes the shot to square leg. A single, nonetheless
good length on off stump, and blocked off the back foot to mid off
back of a length outside off, and he pulls this in front of square! Chipped over midwicket, and they come back for a double
short on off stump, and the batsman sways out of the ball's line
good length outside off, and punched through the line off the back foot. Stopped by cover though
good length outside off stump, and he makes some room to slap a cut right over point for a four! First signs of real aggression
flicked to the fine-leg boundary! Length ball angling down leg, and Nizakat swivels to smack this into the vacant region behind square
Close call, but Rath survives! Clipped this to deep midwicket, and was fairly confident for the second run. But the rocket throw from Khaleel made the Hong Kong batsmen slightly uncomfortable
full outside off, and he's driven this square off the front foot! Played with the angled bat, and the shot pings off his bat to the point boundary
nice shape through to MSD! Full on off, and just going past the outside of off stump as the batsman shoulders his arms
back of a length on leg, and he mistimes a pull to fine leg for one
good length on off, and he runs this down to short third man. No chance of a single
good length on off stump, and worked off his pads to deep midwicket. Hong Kong at 56 for no loss after 10 overs
length ball down leg side, can't get the flick away
loopy length ball on leg stump, allows it to come on and tickles it behind square off the front foot
length on off stump, rips away from him as he gets forward. Thick edge past slip for a single
floated up at off stump, gets to the pitch and drives to long-off
length on off stump, driven back to the bowler on the bounce
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on middle stump, spins towards off. Blocked into the covers with the turn
length ball into the pads, nudged through square leg and hears no-ball as he does so

clears short third man and picks up four. Brings third man in and feeds the drive outside off. Nizakat backing away to make room. Scythes at it and it's a thick edge over the bowler. It's also a no-ball.
length on off stump, backs away, exposes the stumps and slaps it off the toe-end to mid-off
length ball slanted in at off stump, driven on the up towards mid-off
another no-ball. Length ball angled in at leg stump. Uses the angle to get it down to fine leg and once more, manages to get the in-form guy on strike for the free hit
pumps it over midwicket to bring up his fifty! Short ball follows him down leg side. He backs away and swats this over the fielder in the deep. That short one didn't rise as much as he'd have liked.
length on off stump, tapped to midwicket from the crease
bouncer up at his chest. Blocked solidly on the back foot
digs the bouncer in too short. Left alone outside off and another extra
full on off stump, leans in and pushes this to mid-on
length ball on leg stump, spins onto his pad as he looks to flick. Lbw appeal turned down
big turn but once again the lbw appeal is turned down. Trapped on the pad on the flick shot, but this is going down too
length on middle stump, flicked down to long-on
length on off stump, leans in and pushes through the mid-off region
length on middle stump, steps out and flicks to midwicket's left
length outside off, leans in and flicks to long-on
short of a length wrong'un, sliding into the corridor. Backs away and chops it into the covers
floated up at a length, wide outside off. Driven on the up to sweeper cover
length on middle stump, stuck in the crease with his feet as he nudges this through square leg
floated up full on off stump, driven firmly to extra cover on the bounce
length ball skids through fast outside off, and from under his bat as he looks to cut
short and wide outside off, springs back and cuts to sweeper cover
buh-bye. Chahal lobs up a full toss on leg stump and Rath swipes it to the midwicket boundary with no fuss
length ball on middle stump, defended off the back foot

dropped. Chahal has put down a simple one low to his right after beating the batsman in flight. Rath was looking to drive through mid-off, but the turn made him get the inside half and lob one back at the bowler who was too slow getting down
length on leg stump, catches this on the pad as he looks to flick
length on middle stump, gets down and paddles it to deep backward's left
length on leg stump, flicked to square leg
length on off stump, spins into him and he flicks to that man at leg gully
wrong'un, short and turning away from off stump. Defended on the back foot
full on middle stump, flicked to midwicket's left. Rohit puts in a dive to stop
length ball spinning in at leg stump. Gets deep in the crease for the flick and deflects this fine off the thigh guard

Kuldeep nearly falls over appealing for lbw and the umpire turns it down. He has beaten him with the worng'un. He wants to flick against the turn and is struck on the back leg in front of middle stump. But did that pitch in line? There's no edge...but pitching outside leg. Decision will stand and India are out of reviews.
googly at a length on off stump, dead-batted on the front foot
short of a length skidder outside off, mistimed punch towards long-off
length on off stump, steps out and flicks to long-on
length on middle stump, punched to midwicket off the back foot
length outside off, defended to cover with the turn
inside edge as he looks to drive a full ball. Second time he's done this against spin, looking to drive without getting close. This one hits the boot and rolls into the covers
quicker one at a length on off stump, hurries him as he looks to push this down the ground
full on leg stump, gently pokes this through square leg off the front foot
tossed up outside off, lunges ahead and clips with the turn to long-on
full on leg stump, driven against the turn to long-on

slices over the infield and it's a good option. Things had become quiet for a bit and he needed to manufacture a boundary. Did so by getting down the pitch and slicing against the turn to lift an orthodox leggie over cover
length ball down leg side, shuffles a bit to flick, but he can't make connection. It's a wide and that brings up hundred. Only the second one in HK history during a chase.
short of a length on leg, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
short of a length on leg stump, nudged to deep square off the back foot
short of a length outside off, punched past the bowler off the back foot
short and wide outside off, backs away and cuts straight to point
nicely bowled. Gets this length ball to dip as the batsman steps out. Wants to drive to long-off, but it rolls down the pitch off the inside half
short of a length on leg stump, on the back foot to flick this to deep backward square
beaten. Once more, not to the pitch for the drive. This is a length ball wide outside off and spinning a long way away
length outside off, nice stride this time, driven with the turn to long-off
short of a length skidder, he gets an inside edge as he gets deep in the crease and survives the lbw shout
full on middle stump, jammed down the pitch
belts this down the ground. What a clean hit. Gets down the pitch to make the pace and bludgeons it wide of Jadhav to find the straight boundary
full toss on middle stump, clipped to long-on
short of a length, angled in at off stump, spins away and he's forced to check the punch
exposes the stumps at a ball that's sliding in and keeping low. Manages to punch this off the back foot though, out to sweeper
full on middle, and flicked off his toes to deep midwicket. They come back for a second
tossed up on leg stump, and Rath comes down the ground. Flicks to the leg side
flighted on middle stump, and worked off his pads to the leg side
tossed up on off stump, and driven down the ground to long off for a walking single. He's struggling. Maybe a cramp
back of a length on middle, and punched down the ground to long on once again
full on middle and leg, and once again comfortably driven past the non-striker to long on
short on middle, and angling down leg. Rath makes room and meets this low delivery on the full, swinging across the line to deep midwicket
good length outside off stump, and cut square off the back foot to point
good length on middle, and spinning inwards. Rath moves to the leg side and blocks
full on off, and he drives through the covers off the front foot
good length on middle, and punched down the ground off the back foot
big appeal for lbw! But not given. it's a slider from around the wicket, and the ball lands on off and skids through. Rath misses the defense, but the ball was spinning too much
good length on leg stump, and whipped off his pads to deep midwicket
length ball just outside off, and cut off the back foot to point
good length just outside off, and cut off the back foot to point once again
full just outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
full just outside off, and driven with the spin off the front foot to deep extra cover
length ball on off, and spinning into his pads. Worked off his legs to the leg side
flat on middle, and he goes onto the back foot. Punches through the line to long on for a walking single
full just outside off, and worked away to the leg side
lands on middle, but angling down leg. Flicked to square leg with ease
length ball on middle, and he drives off the back foot to long off
full just outside off, and skidding straight through. Goes past the bat's outside edge and into Dhoni's gloves
slower through the air. Full just outside off, and tapped off the front foot towards the bowler
tossed up on middle stump, and he drives with the straight bat to long off once more
in the air! But lands beyond the fielders at cover point. Full outside off, and Nizakat backs away and makes room, before slapping this right over the infield. Falls in no man's land
full on middle stump, and clipped off his toes to Rohit at midwicket
full on middle, and spinning into his pads. Nudged to the leg side
full just outside off stump, and he slog-sweeps safely over midwicket. There's Bhuvi at wide long-on though
stays low, but the turner from middle to leg is comfortably whipped to square leg for a single
full outside off, and he tries to drive away from his body. Misses the shot completely
full pitched on middle stump, and he squeezes this ball back to the bowler
full on middle, and tapped to short mid on off the front foot. They look for a single, but none on offer
full outside off, and Nikazat backs away to muscle this over covers. But the ball goes under his bat and into MSD's gloves
full on off, and his cover drive takes a thick edge to cover point. Went squarer than he anticipated
full on middle, and he flicks this off his toes to deep midwicket
full outside off, and this spins away from the right-hander. Left alone
good length ball on off, and the wrong'un goes away from Nizakat once again. He slaps a cut in the air, but the ball lands before Chahal at short third man
good length outside off, and spinning away. Cut off the back foot to deep extra cover
full on middle, and turning across off stump. He takes a big stride forward and blocks
full outside off, and this is the quicker ball! Zips straight through and the batsman misses the drive. Takes an inside edge and ricochets off MSD's pads
full just outside off stump, and he drives away from his body to cover
length ball just outside off, and fended
full just outside off stump, and he punches this through the covers off the back foot
full on off, and carefully blocked off the front foot
overpitched on middle stump, and he bunts this drive past Rath to mid on
full on middle, and he flicks this with the turn to backward square leg
worked off the back foot to point with the angled bat. No run though
good length on middle, and that's been worked off his hips to deep midwicket. Sliding effort in the deep from Jadhav
back of a length on middle stump, flicked fine off his hips and they're off for a quick double! Gets to fifty as well!
good length on middle, and fended off the back foot to mid off
slower ball! Good length on middle, and angling away from Anshy. He tries to fend it from near the body, but the ball sneaks past his outside edge instead
good length on leg stump, and worked off his hips to fine leg
Bhuvi goes full and wide, and Nizakat goes hard and straight. Slaps this in front of square, but it goes to mid off on the bounce
back of a length on off, and he goes on the back foot, and pulls over Chahal at midwicket. Chase for Dhawan at deep midwicket, but he manages to pull it back before it reaches the boundary
good length outside off stump, and Rath makes room, before crunching a cut through to the fielder at deep point
good length on middle stump. Bowled from much nearer the stumps. Flicked to the leg side
full outside leg, and Nizakat moves to his right to make some room. Crunches a drive straight back to Jadhav
shouts of catch it but drops short of Khaleel at short third man. Full outside off, and Nizakat tried to muscle this over the bowler. Took an outside edge, but fell just before the fielder
full just outside off, and he comes down the ground. Swings across the line, and mistimes to mid on
short of a length and in at the hips. Allows it to come in and chips it over square leg
length ball outside off. An offcutter. Driven on the up to sweeper cover
four! After about 11 overs. Short of a length, cross-seam ball banged in at a middle stump line. He makes room and swings at it. Gets an outside edge that flies past the keeper
offcutter, full on middle stump. Flicked to midwicket's right
length ball into the pads, allows it to come on and tickles it fine
length ball down pads, uses the angle to flick this down to fine leg

has he cleared midwicket> Yes! Oh that's brave and perfectly executed. Short of a length ball skididng in towards the base of middle stump and he gets really deep in the crease for his. Manages to launch it over the boundary
short of a length outside off, chops to backward point
length on off, punched back to the bowler
length on middle stump, pushed down the pitch off the back foot
inside edge onto what seems the knee. Short ball in at leg stump, looks to slaughter this pull shot but can't get it away
short of a length outside off, cut to point's left. He dives but can't stop cleanly
short of a length in at off stump, backs away and exposes off stump for the cut. Decides to check it and dabs into the off side
steps out and is forced to block this short of a length ball as it gets big on him. Luckily for him it was spinning in. He wasn't to the pitch
length ball turning down leg side, gets a glove to short fine's left as he looks to sweep this
length on off stump, big edge to short third man's left as he looks to push at this with no forward stride. Rath puts in a big slide to get back in the crease
length on leg stump, steered to short fine's right with a sweep
lovely ball. Length ball lobbed right up outside off. Nizakat lulled into a drive that he is nowhere close to getting  to because of the rip away
length and in at leg stump, nudged to deep square off the back foot
past the outside edge. Looked like he expected that to come into him. 136kph, short of a length across the corridor. Whips the bat inside the line
sliced over point with venom! Into the nineties. This is also Hong Kong's highest partnership ever. Short and wide ball, plenty of pace and chucks his entire body weight into this shot
short of a length outside off, runs it down to third man
short of a length outside off, nudges it down to third man
length on off stump, pushed into the covers off the front foot

got him at extra cover! Rath has picked out extra cover with a gentle drive. Soft is accurate to describe that. Full on off stump, lofted with the turn and straight to the fielder. Nothing soft about the overall impact of his innings. A stupendous knock. But is this the in for India? It's not easy to get in on this pitch
short of a length and he goes very deep in the crease to push this back to the bowler
beaten. No idea where that's going. Wrong'un, past the outside edge as he pushes forward
beaten again. Right, he doesn't have a clue at the moment. Short of a length outside off, feeble push
beaten again! Floated up at a length on off stump, pushes to defend for the one that comes in and it's past the outside edge
short of a length slider outside off, punched to extra cover off the back foot
full ball down leg side, shuffles to flick, can't get bat on it
length outside off, opens the face and runs it to point off the front foot
length outside off, makes room and opens the face to try and get it down to third man. Can't beat backward point
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Shapes to cut but he's done by the variation. Check-pushes it to extra cover

he's given him lbw! Nizakat has reviewed it. Appeared to have been struck on off and middle stump as he looked to flick this length ball coming into him...no bat on this. And it is whacking middle stump. Khaleel's debut wicket has knocked Hong Kong back. Length ball that Nizakat missed. Trapped in his crease too, there was some pace on that. He won't be around to see Hong Kong through today, but his getting out in the 36th over is the story - he has set them up for a miracle. A knock to remember.
short of a length on leg stump, cramps him up on the flick. Lbw appeal turned down.
short ball in at the chest, defended solidly off the back foot
beaten in flight but manages to get his body on this. Length ball at middle stump, steps out and is in trouble till he gets behind it
googly, tossed up full on middle stump. Pushed with the turn to extra cover
googly, short of a length outside off. Hurried punch into the covers
length ball turning in at off stump, allows it to come on and opens the face to get this to short third man
googly, length at off stump, gets on the back foot and pokes it to extra cover
short ball at off stump, on the back foot for a pull down to long-on
length and in at off stump, opens the face and runs it down to third man
short and wide outside off, chops at it and is beaten
length in the corridor, blocked into the covers off the front foot
gets it wide of both mid-off and extra cover. Good shot. Length ball outside off, steps out and creams it
137kph, short ball outside off, steps out again. Looks to pull and gets it wide of mid-off. Too quick for that.
outside edge falls short of Dhoni to his right. Short of a length offcutter in the corridor. Opens the face and can't get runs with this
inside edge against a slider. He's defending for the googly on the front foot. Gets it back onto his back pad
length on leg stump, steps out and taps to midwicket
squared up and looks a bit silly. Down the track, a bit of a dance, cops it on the back foot as this turns away
boom! Bye. Gets one in the slot and puts his hips into this! Googly at a length on leg stump, a big jump down the pitch and he has sent this flying over the sightscreen
tossed up outside off, steps out and jams it down to long-off
length ball on off stump, driven with the turn, on the up to long-off
guides it to Dhoni. This is top bowling. 138kph ball cramping him in the corridor. He wants to tickle it to the third man boundary but that hurried him and he's caught inside the line
short of a length outside off, pushed through cover on the up
short and wide outside off, fizzes past the bat as he looks to guide this down to third man
length ball outside off, aimless swing at it. It dribbles out to mid-on
offcutter, short and wide outside off. Forced to adjust his shape with the late cut and that's enough for him to hit it straight to point

clubbed! Oh geez that is power! There's a guy 15 yards behind him who might know a thing or two about how to do that - a slap, flat to clear long-off to his right. Off the back foot. Against a rising short of a length ball. Incredible.
tossed up on off, and driven down the ground to long off. Just a single ,but they'll need to get more than that
Hayat walks! Tossed up outside off, and he tries to drive away from his body. The ball turns away, and takes an outside edge!
full on off, and he drags a sweep from outside the stumps to deep midwicket. Only the third time they've gone past 200 while chasing in ODIs!
flighted on off, and driven to the side of mid-off
short outside off, and cut off the back foot to deep point. Just a single
tossed up from outside the wicket, driven away from his body to deep extra cover
length ball on middle, and punched off the back foot to deep extra cover
good length on off and angling into his pads. Flicked away to the leg side, but no chance of a run
good length on the fourth-stump line, and batsman rides the bounce to defend off the back foot
back of a length on off, and he comes down the ground. Sees a short ball, and checks his shot to cover for a run
good length outside off, and he opens the bat's face to run it down to third man
slower ball, short on off. It's going across the batsman and it's been called a wide. The knuckle ball doesn't come off
length ball on leg stump, and that's been whipped off his pads to the leg side. The batsman almost collided while running across. Eyes on the ball
slogged over deep midwicket! Tossed up outside off, and he goes down on one knee. Slaps this across the line, and deposits this ball over the stands
full just outside off, but spinning away from the left hander. He sticks his bat out, and steers this to shotr third man
flighted outside off, and that's been muscled over the cover fielder. Lands in no man's land as it rolls over to deep extra cover
full outisde leg stump, and that's been swept fine past MS Dhoni. Shikhar Dhawan runs around the boundary-line and manages to pull the ball back
almost a yorker outside off stump. He wedges a drive back to Yuzi
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
full just outside off, and the cover drive takes the outside edge to third man
back of a length on off, and he taps this off the backfoot to the leg side for a quick single. Nice, early call for one
good length outside off, and he hammers a cut between point and cover for a single
back of a length on off, and he opens his bat's face to dab a run down to third man
back of a length on leg stump, and the ball took some extra bounce! Hits the handle of his bat and runs away to the off side
full just outside off, and that's been slapped after charging down the ground. Hit in front of square, and they manage to come back for the second. Hong Kong need 59 off 36
back of a length outside off, and spinning further away. He tries to cut square, but misses the shot completely. Dot
full outside off, and he slaps this away from his body. Slices the shot, and it's popped up it in the air. Dhawan gets under it from point and composes himself to complete the catch
full on off, and he walks down the ground. Works it towards the leg side

ful on off, and spinning inwards! The wrong'un traps him right in front of off stump, and the umpire has no hesitation in raising his finger. Hong Kong six down, and now India are surely favourites once again
full just outside off, and tapped off the front foot to the leg side. A brilliant over from Chahal so far
length ball on leg stump, and he checks his shot. Works it towards the leg side
length ball on off, and angling into the right-hander. Blocked off the front foot
yorker just outside off, but he manages to wedge this fine past MSD's right. Running away for four, but Jadhav's diving effort at third man ensures it doesn't
back of a length on middle, and he fails to connect with the pull. Hits the body, but he's off for a single anyway
full just outside off, and he shuffles across to the off side, before flicking this off his toes to deep backward square
good length outside off stump, and he pokes his bat out to meet it. Edged on the bounce to the keeper
swing and a miss. Length ball just outside off, and he completely misses the pull
full on off, and he paddles a sweep to short fine leg
reverse swept over point! Got into position early, and flicked this off his wrists over the infield on the off side

stumped! Tries to swing through to the leg side, but Kuldeep's floater lands outside off, and then spins further away. Sneaks between bat and body, and MSD easily takes the bails off. 50th ODI wicket for Kuldeep!
good length outside off, and tapped off the back foot to point
full just outside off, and he defends it away off the front foot
hammered over the bowler's head! Full on middle, and he clears his front leg to thump a maximum into the sightscreen
thumped right over the bowler's head, but not off the bat's middle. Lands safe, but mid on comes and intercepts
knee-high full toss on off stump. He slaps a shot through the covers to the fielder in the deep
length ball but wide outside off. The batsman came down the wicket trying to swing wildly, but he just can't connect with the ball
slower ball, full outside off stump again. Swing and miss once more. Dhoni collects
full just outside off, and drilled down the ground to long on for one
back of a length on middle, and he misses the shot
good length outside off, and he misses the cut shot. Rolls into the keeper's gloves
steered his bat's face to short third man
good length, but he muscles this mis-hit to the leg side for a single
yorker on leg stump, and he squeezes this down to short fine leg. MSD runs to his left to intercept
knee-high full toss on leg stump, thats muscled off his pads to the leg side
low full toss on middle stump, and that's been thumped with the straight bat, back past Bhuvi for four
that's his third wicket! Slower ball on middle, and he tries to muscle this towards the leg side. Takes a top-edge and Khaleel calls for the catch near short mid on
full on leg stump, and that's been wedged away to the off side
full on middle, and that's been tapped off the back foot to cover
back of a length outside off, and the cut has been missed by Nawaz. Through to the keeper
good length on middle, and worked away to third man for a single
yorker just outside off, and he can't get bat to ball! Dhoni collects and India win by 26 runs!
